translation.en: [sighs] [man 1] Third break down this month.
-[woman 1] Let's just walk back… -[woman 2] Hi, sorry, Min.
Not the best way to spend your birthday.
It's fine.
I'd rather be home watching my dramas anyway.
translation.ko: 그냥 집에 가서 드라마나 보지, 뭐

translation.en: Hey, shouldn't we go with the crowd?
Look, there's someone up ahead.
[Alexandra] Manila, she'll welcome you with smiles as warm as the sun.
translation.ko: 마닐라는 해처럼 환한 미소로 우리를 맞아 준다

translation.en: When the sun sets, take a turn down a dark alley…
translation.ko: 하지만 해가 지고 어두운 골목으로 들어서면

translation.en: and you might find yourself as prey.
Kidnappers and thieves are the least of your worries.
Beware the ones that crave your blood and covet your soul.
translation.ko: 피와 영혼을 탐내는 놈들을 조심해야 한다

translation.en: They can't be bound by handcuffs.
My father used to say, "Leave the shadows be.
Light will be there to maintain the balance."
Night has taken this city.
The shadows have grown darker.
The treaty that has kept the humans safe
from the supernatural Underworld has begun to unravel.
translation.ko: 인간을 지켜 주던 조약은 서서히 힘을 잃어갔다

translation.en: Good people keep trying to fight back, but the dark forces are getting stronger.
translation.ko: 사람들이 힘을 뭉쳐 싸워도 어둠의 힘은 계속 강해진다

translation.en: There is no light to keep the shadows in check.
There is only me.
Good evening, Captain Guerrero.
Hello, Alexandra. Thanks for coming down.
translation.ko: 어서 와, 알렉산드라 와 줘서 고마워

translation.en: I had a feeling you might want to see this.
I admit, I was curious when you described the circumstances.
translation.ko: 네, 서장님 말씀 듣고 궁금해서 달려왔어요

translation.en: So, is it…
[Alexandra] The White Lady of Balete Drive.
Any witnesses, Lt. Tapia?
[Tapia] No, ma'am.
But one of the neighbors positively ID'd the victim as "Gina Santos."
translation.ko: 주민 말을 들어보니 지나 산토스의 시신 같아요

translation.en: [Tapia] We checked it, and it turns out she committed suicide in…
-[paper rustles] -"…1995."
Wait, that can't be right.
Ancient runes crudely done. -[Alexandra] Clearly ritual sacrifice. -[scrapes]
translation.ko: 조잡한 고대 룬문자를 보니 제물로 바쳐졌나 봐요

translation.en: The bigger question is, who would want to kill a ghost and why?
translation.ko: 대체 누가, 무슨 이유로 귀신을 죽였을까요?

translation.en: [Miranda] Death is nothing to be afraid of, Alexandra.
It is not an end, but a rebirth to another plane of existence.
translation.ko: 죽으면 끝나는 게 아니라 다른 차원에서 다시 태어나거든

translation.en: There was a time when magic in the world was a natural part of life.
translation.ko: 예전엔 마법이 우리 일상의 한 부분이었는데

translation.en: That age has passed.
People fear what they don't understand.
That's why our family has always been the bridge between mankind
translation.ko: 우리 가족은 인간과 초자연적 존재를 잇는

translation.en: and the supernatural.
Your father might be the lakan and protector of the accords,
translation.ko: 조약의 수호자 라칸인 너희 아빠 못지않게

translation.en: but I know a few things.
-When a soul gets lost… -[gentle music]
…we, babaylan, have the power to help.
translation.ko: 우리 같은 바바일란이 길을 찾아 줘야 해

translation.en: [Guerrero] Tapia, get SOCO to gather the evidence before it blows away.
-[plastic crinkles] -[Tapia] Yes, Cap!
What?
You just reminded me of your father for a moment.
Anton was usually the only one with a clue in a case like this.
translation.ko: 이런 사건을 풀 수 있는 건 안톤밖에 없었거든

translation.en: But now that he's gone…
well, now we have you, Alexandra.
There are a few places to acquire magic this strong.
translation.ko: 이렇게 강력한 주문을 아는 놈은 많지 않지만

translation.en: But I know where to start looking.
I have friends in low places.
[in English] I need to see your master. I have some questions for him.
translation.ko: 네 주인님 불러와 물어볼 거 있으니까

translation.en: Down, boy. She's on the level.
Greetings, young Trese.
Good evening, Nuno.
I can always count on you for the dirt.
Nuno sees nothing and hears nothing.
translation.ko: 누노는 본 것도, 들은 것도 없어

translation.en: -[Nuno] I just… -[paper rips]
What do you know about the White Lady?
translation.ko: 화이트 레이디에 관해 아는 거 없어?

translation.en: Okay, okay.
Last week, she was crowing about how her lover
translation.ko: 자기 애인 덕에 곧 여왕이 될지 모른다며

translation.en: was going to make her a queen
if she helped close a deal with an aswang clan.
translation.ko: 그 대신 어떤 아스왕 조직이랑 거래하는 걸 돕기로 했는데

translation.en: [Nuno] Then I hear whispers in the tunnels that somebody put a hit out on her.
translation.ko: 곧 누군가 화이트 레이디 목에 현상금을 걸었대

translation.en: Aswang?
What did they want with her?
[Nuno] If you want a seat at their table, the buy-in is a sacrifice.
That dizzy dame thought she was going to be a player.
translation.ko: 그 멍청한 여자는 한번 큰물에서 놀아 보려다가

translation.en: But she ended up as the chips.
I need to find out which clan made the pact, and then with whom.
translation.ko: 어떤 조직이 누구랑 거래했는지 알려 줘

translation.en: Oh, you'll know the crew from the poison they used.
translation.ko: 놈들이 쓴 독약만 봐도 답이 딱 나오지

translation.en: For a bite of that, I could tell you what it is.
translation.ko: 한 입만 주면 싹 다 불게

translation.en: -[Alexandra] Well? -[exclaims]
Ground mermaid bones.
Surefire way to trap a ghost in the earthly plane and kill it.
translation.ko: 지상에 귀신을 가둬 한 방에 죽이는 명약이지

translation.en: [Nuno] The aswang pack that controls the pier are the only ones who have it.
translation.ko: 그 뼛가루를 쓰는 건 부두를 점령한 아스왕 조직뿐이야

translation.en: But you didn't hear that from me. [chuckles] Nobody likes a snitch.
translation.ko: 내가 말했다고 하지 마 입 싸다고 소문나기 싫으니까

translation.en: A pleasure doing business with you, as always.
-[phone beeps] -Boys, time to go hunting.
[aswang 1] Hey! No humans allowed.
Your kind is not welcome here.
-[objects clatter] -[aswang 2] Hey!
The only way you can get in-- [groans, thuds]
Greetings, Ibwa, Chief of the Sapa Clan.
I am Alexandra Trese.
The aswang clan signed the accords with my father,
translation.ko: 너희 조직이 우리 아버지랑 한 약속 알지?

translation.en: and you are bound by those rules to cooperate with my investigation
translation.ko: 수사에 협력하든 약속 어기고 대가를 치르든 맘대로 해

translation.en: or face the consequences.
translation.ko: 약속 어기고 대가를 치르든 맘대로 해

translation.en: [in Filipino] This son of a bitch.
[in English] You come to my turf, and threaten me?
translation.ko: 감히 우리 구역까지 와서 날 협박해?

translation.en: Only I make the rules around here, bitch.
translation.ko: 이 구역의 규칙은 내가 정한다 이년아

translation.en: -End her! -[growls]
[Alexandra] Tell them to go away
or I swear you'll have taken your last breath.
Do what she says.
-[aswang 3] We'll be right outside. -[aswang 4] Yes, Chief.
Who did you give the mermaid bones to?
[Ibwa] Screw you.
The accords dictate that I should give you a warning
for obstructing an investigation.
No. [groaning]
Consider yourself warned.
Is that an aswang eye?
That's pretty badass.
I need the water in the glass, please.
Thirsty, bossing?
I want to see what kind of creature of darkness we're dealing with here.
that fire monster again, Mama?
[Miranda] His face can be a little scary, but he is not a monster.
He is the Great Spirit of the Binondo Fire,
and we must show him respect.
Remember what your papa and I always tell you.
-You need to-- -You need to see beyond the outside.
[light snicker] Correct.
All of us must see beyond to live in balance.
translation.ko: 세상과 조화롭게 살아가려면 겉이 아닌 속을 봐야 해

translation.en: Give me your hand.
[phone beeps] Anton, how was the council meeting?
[exhales] [Miranda] I knew they would side with you.
Now stay in the city. We're fine.
translation.ko: 우린 도시만 안 벗어나면 괜찮을 거예요

translation.en: -We'll see you later… -[line static]
Hello?
My love, it's time to play that game I taught you, okay?
translation.ko: 엄마가 저번에 알려 준 게임을 해 보자

translation.en: [Miranda] Remember where Papa and I showed you how to hide?
I want you to go there and don't come out until I call.
translation.ko: 거기 가서 엄마가 부를 때까지 나오지 마

translation.en: Okay, Mama.
[in English] Stay as quiet as you can and keep Sinag close.
translation.ko: 조용히 숨어 있어 시낙 잃어버리지 말고

translation.en: [Miranda] Whatever happens, remember to see beyond the outside.
translation.ko: 겉모습에 속지 말라는 말 절대 잊지 마

translation.en: I love you, my darling.
So very much.
Now, go.
Hello, Captain Guerrero.
[Mayor Santamaria] Crimes like these cannot wait for due process.
translation.ko: 이런 흉악 범죄는 법대로 수사할 필요가 없어요

translation.en: I promise to find and punish the guilty myself.
-This is why the people elected me. -No rest for the wicked, Captain.
Tell me about it.
We may need you on this one, too.
Doesn't help that I got a circus trampling on my crime scene.
…and why they will do so again!
[all] Yeah!
Mayor Santamaria's office got wind of it.
And now, he wants to take over.
God, I love election time.
He might be trying to cover something up rather than solve it.
translation.ko: 뭔가 덮고 싶은 게 있어서 저러는 걸지도 몰라요

translation.en: [Guerrero] Mayor Santamaria isn't someone you can go up against, Alexandra.
translation.ko: 산타마리아 시장은 함부로 덤빌 상대가 아니야

translation.en: He's got backers rich enough to keep him in office
and powerful enough to make his critics disappear.
Gina Santos, the White Lady of Balete Drive,
was his mistress when she killed herself.
He sacrificed her ghost to gain favor with the aswang.
translation.ko: 시장은 아스왕에게 잘 보이려고 지나의 혼을 바쳤죠

translation.en: If he's aligning with them, I need to know why.
[PR] Vote for Mayor Santamaria. Reelect a man who cares for the people.
translation.ko: 자나 깨나 시민 생각뿐인 시장님의 재선을 도와주세요

translation.en: [Basilio] Hoy!
Do I know you?
We have a mutual acquaintance.
Ibwa tells me you took some mermaid bones from him.
He runs a bad crew, Mr. Mayor.
You're better off coming clean for the murder of Gina Santos
translation.ko: 지나 산토스 죽인 거 깨끗하게 인정하시고

translation.en: than dealing with them.
What a wild imagination you have for such a pretty face.
But if you're going to accuse me of something that serious,
you'd better have proof.
I have important work to do for my constituents.
I don't have time for fairy tales of aswang and mermaids.
translation.ko: 아스왕이니, 인어니 뜬구름 잡는 소리 하지 마

translation.en: I never said anything about aswang, Mr. Mayor.
translation.ko: 전 놈들이 아스왕이라고 말한 적 없는데요

translation.en: Apparently, the train broke down over the Guadalupe Bridge.
translation.ko: 과달루페 다리 위에서 열차가 서 버렸어

translation.en: Service crew found it like this, lots of blood, no bodies,
translation.ko: 정비사들이 도착했을 땐 온통 피바다였는데 시체는 한 구도 없고 전원 실종됐어

translation.en: and a pile of missing persons reports.
translation.ko: 시체는 한 구도 없고 전원 실종됐어

translation.en: Do you smell something burning?
[sniffs] No.
There was a fire at the squatters area nearby.
translation.ko: 근처 빈민촌에서 밤에 불이 나긴 했는데

translation.en: But that was two nights ago.
We're still trying to locate those residents.
They seem to have vanished.
I see.
Will you excuse me, Captain?
I would like the car to myself, please.
-[line dialing] -[fire roars]
Good evening, little Trese.
What game shall we play today?
Greetings, Great Santelmo.
I'm afraid this is business,
and I need your help to uncover what happened.
Well, you're no fun.
The souls who were killed in this car are here,
translation.ko: 열차에서 죽은 자들의 영혼이 아직 여기 있어

translation.en: yet, they are not, and they are not alone.
I sense spirits on fire.
[Santelmo] People who had burned to death in their sleep.
They, too, are making the journey.
How can the souls be here and yet not be here?
translation.ko: 영혼이 여기 있다는 거예요? 없다는 거예요?

translation.en: We are standing in two trains right now.
[Santelmo] One for the living…
And the other for the dead.
Thank you, Santelmo. May the great light shone upon you.
[in English] Ibu, Goddess of Death, sends her greetings to you…
translation.ko: 죽음의 여신 이부 님께서 제게 안부를 전하라 하셨습니다

translation.en: [in Filipino] …Lakan of humanity.
[in English] Emissary, since when does Ibu use the MRT
translation.ko: 사자님, 죽음의 여신께서 대체 언제부터 전철로

translation.en: to ferry the souls of the dead?
The train follows the original pathways.
[Emissary] The most efficient way to the Afterworld.
It wasn't in the original agreement with your father,
but she formally asks that you,
as the current lakan and enforcer of the accords,
translation.ko: 조약의 수호자 라칸의 자리를 물려받은 트레세 님께서

translation.en: consider her request to use it.
I will allow it, but in return, I need a favor.
Tell me where those three girls died and how.
They were hunted down by a clan of aswang on these tracks.
translation.ko: 철로 주변에 숨어 사는 아스왕 패거리 손에 죽었습니다

translation.en: Taken to the tribe's lair, where they met their demise
and their souls found their way back to Ibu's train.
translation.ko: 이부 님의 열차로 영혼만 돌아온 거죠

translation.en: They were not the only ones.
Show me where they were killed.
-As you wish. -[flapping]
-[tires screech] -[engine shuts off]
-[Alexandra] Wait for my signal. -[car door opens, closes]
[Crispin] You got it, bossing. We'll be ready when you need us.
Please help me.
They took my daughter.
Mark the soul as ours before it flies away.
translation.ko: 영혼이 빠져나가기 전에 우리 거라고 표시해 둬

translation.en: Or Xa-Mul will kill us.
The souls are worth more than the meat.
translation.ko: 뭐니 뭐니 해도 고기보단 혼이 맛있지

translation.en: [aswang 5] Hold still, you brat!
It's all right. You're safe now.
[Xa-mul] Trese!
I know you're in there with our food.
I could smell your stench from a mile away.
Stay close.
[Xa-mul] Don't be rude.
Come out and join the party.
[aswang 6] Trese!
It's not a party when your guests are here against their will, Xa-Mul.
-The accords-- -Don't apply here.
Not after what you did to Ibwa. [scoffs]
Those humans were a payment and ours to do with as we please.
translation.ko: 거래의 대가로 받은 먹잇감들이니까 구워 먹든, 삶아 먹든 우리 맘이야

translation.en: Take the girl!
If the lakan gets in the way…
kill her.
Kill her.
[Xa-mul] Walk away, Trese.
And maybe I'll let this offense slide.
translation.ko: 날 모욕한 건 없던 일로 해 주마

translation.en: [Basilio] It was Kuya Crispin, who disobeyed your order to wait.
[Crispin] Couldn't let you have all the fun this time, bossing.
It's okay.
[Crispin] Oh, and we freed the people in the back.
Cover me.
[in Filipino] Mother! My baby.
[in English] Thank you. You saved my baby.
Can you tell us what happened?
A group of us had survived the fire in Guadalupe but lost everything.
translation.ko: 과달루페에 불이 나서 목숨 빼고 모든 걸 잃었는데

translation.en: [mother] Mayor Santamaria's men came and offered to pay for our relocation.
translation.ko: 시장의 부하들이 와서 이주 비용을 대준다고 했어요

translation.en: They had been trying to get us to move even before the fire.
translation.ko: 불이 나기 전부터 우리한테 이주하라고 독촉했어요

translation.en: [man 2] We all knew he was making a deal to build condos,
so we wanted to hold out for a better price.
translation.ko: 저희도 최대한 버텨 돈을 더 받으려고 했죠

translation.en: But now,
-there was no choice. -[metal gate closes]
At first, it was good.
[man 3] We had a clean place to stay and they fed us.
The mayor himself came and promised that he would take care of everything.
translation.ko: 시장이 직접 와서 다 해결해 주겠다고 약속했어요

translation.en: Then, night fell.
-[scribbles] -The aswang.
-[man 4] They came for us while we slept. -[screams]
They dragged us away and kept us in cages. And we weren't the only ones.
translation.ko: 어딘가로 끌고 가 우리에 가뒀어요 저희만 당한 게 아니에요

translation.en: Every day, they brought groups of people.
Like us, they were taken in the dark of night
where nobody would miss us.
From broken down trains to squatters area set on fire,
translation.ko: 열차가 멈춰 버리고 빈민촌에 불이 나도

translation.en: all of us powerless to do anything but wait.
translation.ko: 가만있는 것 말곤 우리에겐 방법이 없었어요

translation.en: We could hear the feasting and screams through the walls.
translation.ko: 벽 너머로 살이 뜯기는 비명이 들려왔어요

translation.en: I saw the Mayor in the kitchen talking to the aswang.
[woman 3] Renegotiating their deal.
He promised he would cover up their train raid
and burn more settlements for their food supply.
We called out to him for help, but he ignored us.
translation.ko: 우리 비명은 들은 척도 안 했어요

translation.en: Once he got what he wanted, we were nothing to him.
Ah, we may not be able
to arrest Mayor Santamaria for making deals with the aswang,
translation.ko: 아스왕이랑 거래한 것만으로는 시장을 체포할 수 없지만

translation.en: but we got him on human trafficking, arson,
and the murder of his mistress, Gina Santos.
You okay?
There are monsters among us, and some of them human.
translation.ko: 괴물은 늘 우리 곁에 있죠 인간이 괴물이 되기도 하고요

translation.en: I should have gotten there sooner to save the others.
But look at all the people you saved.
[Anton] Alexandra?
Alexandra.
It's all right, little one. You're safe with Papa.
Those aswang scum will pay for this.
Mama.
Rough night, huh, bossing?
No more than usual, Hank.
Mayor Sancho Santamaria was arrested this morning
translation.ko: 산타마리아 시장이 오늘 아침 체포됐습니다 "ABC-ZNN 뉴스 특종"

translation.en: on several dozen counts of murder and corruption
connected with the fire at Guadalupe.
[reporter] According to our sources,
there is also new evidence linking the Mayor
to the death of his alleged mistress, Gina Santos.
What was reported as a suicide is now believed to be a murder.
What is it?
I bring a peace offering from Ibu for your arsenal.
She hopes the lakan has forgiven her mistake.
The Goddess of Death hardly needs to worry about offending anyone.
When the sixth child of the sixth child
takes her rightful place as ruler of the Underworld,
as was foretold by the prophecy,
the Court of Death would like to be in her good graces.
translation.ko: 죽음의 심판장과 좋은 관계를 유지해 주십시오

translation.en: That's not me.
But you may tell Ibu that we are good.
For now.
Yes. Captain? I'm here.
♪ When I feel you next to me ♪
